text: @BernieSanders @AOC @IlhanMN @RashidaTlaib @grandson If you listen to any part of this whole thing @AOC with the most critical words of this crisis.. “It’s like #coronavirus spilled gasoline over every slow-rolling crisis that we have been experiencing in the United States”... powerful. https://t.co/xhGQ5qcwS5
